purpose: Evaluation des pipelines Graph RAG (WF2) et Quantitative RAG (WF4) avec questions calibrees sur les donnees benchmark (financial-tables-migration.sql). Inclut tests specifiques pour ISSUE-QT-13 (ILIKE entity names) et ISSUE-QT-14 (null aggregation detection).

questions.question: What is the total revenue of TechVision for fiscal year 2023?
questions.notes: Tests ILIKE fix - DB has 'TechVision Inc' not 'TechVision'. Previous bug returned null.

questions.question: Quel est le chiffre d'affaires de GreenEnergy en 2023?
questions.notes: Tests ILIKE fix in French - DB has 'GreenEnergy Corp' not 'GreenEnergy'.

questions.question: What is the net income of HealthPlus in FY 2023?
questions.notes: Tests ILIKE fix - DB has 'HealthPlus Labs' not 'HealthPlus'.

questions.question: What is the year-over-year revenue growth rate of TechVision Inc from 2022 to 2023?
Quel est le taux de croissance du revenu de GreenEnergy Corp entre 2022 et 2023?
What was the percentage change in HealthPlus Labs revenue from 2020 to 2023?
What is the gross profit margin of TechVision Inc in FY 2023?
What is the operating margin of GreenEnergy Corp for fiscal year 2023?
Which company had the highest net income in FY 2023?
What is the total combined revenue of all three companies in FY 2023?
What was TechVision Inc's revenue in Q4 2023?
What percentage of TechVision's FY 2023 revenue came from Q4?
What are the total assets of TechVision Inc as of December 31, 2023?
What is the debt-to-equity ratio of GreenEnergy Corp at end of 2023?
How much cash and equivalents did HealthPlus Labs have at the end of 2023?
What is the 4-year CAGR of HealthPlus Labs revenue from 2020 to 2023?
What was the diluted EPS of TechVision Inc in FY 2023?
How much did TechVision Inc spend on R&D in fiscal year 2023?
What percentage of GreenEnergy Corp's FY 2023 revenue was spent on R&D?
What was the quarter-over-quarter revenue growth of HealthPlus Labs from Q3 to Q4 2023?
What was the effective tax rate of TechVision Inc in FY 2023?
What was the change in total stockholders equity of TechVision from 2020 to 2023?
What is the interest coverage ratio of TechVision Inc in 2023?
Which company had the best net income growth from 2022 to 2023 in percentage terms?
What is the total revenue of TechVision in FY 2025?
questions.notes: Tests null aggregation detection - no FY 2025 data exists. Should return NULL_RESULT, not a false positive.

questions.question: Which department has the most employees at TechVision Inc and what is the average salary in that department?
questions.notes: Requires traversing company -> employees -> department aggregation

questions.question: What product category generates the most revenue for TechVision in North America?
questions.notes: Requires: company -> products -> sales_data (filtered by region) -> aggregation by category

questions.question: Which company has the highest average employee salary and how does it compare to the company with the lowest?
questions.expected_answer: All three companies have approximately the same salary structure (same salary array used in seed data)
questions.notes: Cross-entity comparison requiring employees -> company -> aggregation

questions.question: List all products in the 'AI/ML' category and which company manufactures them.
questions.expected_answer: TechVision Inc: VisionAI Platform (TV-AI-001), VisionAI Edge (TV-AI-002)
questions.notes: Simple entity lookup: product category -> product -> company

questions.question: In which region does GreenEnergy Corp generate the most sales revenue from Solar Panels?
questions.notes: Requires: company -> products (Solar Panels) -> sales_data -> group by region

questions.question: How has TechVision's gross profit margin evolved from 2020 to 2023?
How many active employees does each company have in the Europe region?
questions.expected_answer: Each company has approximately 10-12 employees in Europe (varies by seed data distribution)
questions.notes: Requires: employees table filtered by region='Europe' AND status='active', grouped by company_id

questions.question: Which was the most recently launched product across all companies and when was it launched?
questions.notes: Requires sorting products by launch_date DESC across all companies

questions.question: What is the ratio of TechVision's cash reserves to its total revenue in 2023?
questions.notes: Requires joining balance_sheet (cash) with financials (revenue) for same company+year

questions.question: What Battery Storage products does GreenEnergy Corp sell and in which countries?
questions.expected_answer: PowerVault 10kWh and PowerVault 20kWh, sold in United States, Germany, Australia, and UAE
questions.notes: Requires: company -> products (Battery Storage) -> sales_data -> distinct countries

questions.question: Compare the total assets to total liabilities ratio for all three companies at end of 2023. Which is most leveraged?
questions.expected_answer: TechVision: 4.46x, GreenEnergy: 3.77x, HealthPlus: 3.48x. HealthPlus is the most leveraged (lowest ratio).

questions.question: What is the gross margin of the CyberShield product from TechVision?
questions.notes: Direct product lookup: (list_price - unit_cost) / list_price

questions.question: Which company has the highest-priced individual product and what is it?
questions.notes: Requires scanning products across all companies for max list_price

questions.question: Who is the highest-paid employee at GreenEnergy Corp and what is their title?
questions.notes: Employee lookup: max salary where company_id = 'greenenergy'

questions.question: Which company experienced the largest absolute increase in revenue from 2020 to 2023?
In FY 2023, what is the total quantity of GenomeScan 2.0 sold by HealthPlus Labs in Asia Pacific?
questions.expected_answer: Approximately 3,000-4,000 units (varies by quarter due to growth formula)
questions.notes: Requires: product_id='HP-DX-002' AND company_id='healthplus' AND region='Asia Pacific' AND fiscal_year=2023, SUM(quantity)

questions.question: Which company has the highest current ratio (total_current_assets / total_current_liabilities) at end of 2023?
questions.expected_answer: TechVision Inc with current ratio of 3.50
questions.notes: Actually HealthPlus is slightly higher at 3.53 - tests precision

questions.question: What are the distinct product categories offered by HealthPlus Labs?
questions.notes: Simple entity traversal: company -> products -> distinct categories

questions.question: How many employees in the Engineering department work in North America across all three companies?
questions.notes: Requires: employees WHERE department='Engineering' AND region='North America', count across all companies

questions.question: How has GreenEnergy Corp's long-term debt changed from 2020 to 2023?
questions.expected_answer: Decreased from $500,000,000 in 2020 to $300,000,000 in 2023 (40% reduction)

questions.question: What is the revenue of TechVision Inc for Q3 2023?
questions.notes: Uses full company name 'TechVision Inc' - should work with both exact and ILIKE match

questions.question: What is the average list price of all GreenEnergy Corp products?
What percentage of TechVision's total assets in 2023 is represented by goodwill?
What is the distribution of employees by department at HealthPlus Labs?
questions.expected_answer: Engineering: ~15, Sales: ~8, Marketing: ~5, Finance: ~5, Operations: ~5, HR: ~4, Product: ~4, Research: ~4
questions.notes: Requires: employees WHERE company_id='healthplus', GROUP BY department, COUNT

questions.question: What is TechVision's share of total revenue among all three companies in FY 2023?
questions.notes: Requires aggregation across all companies then ratio calculation

ISSUE-QT-13.description: ILIKE entity name matching - LLM must use ILIKE '%name%' not exact =
ISSUE-QT-13.expected_behavior: SQL should contain ILIKE '%...%' for company_name filters

ISSUE-QT-14.description: Null aggregation detection - SUM returning null must be flagged
ISSUE-QT-14.expected_behavior: status=NULL_RESULT, null_aggregation=true, not false positive PASSED
